item.title: Developer Express Announces eXpressApp Framework Beta
item.description: December 19, 2006 - Developer Express is proud to announce the immediate availability of eXpressApp Framework Beta 1.

item.title: Announcing a New Executable Ribbon Notepad Demo built with the upcoming ExpressBars v6
item.description: December 1, 2006 - We are happy to announce the immediate availability of the executable Ribbon Notepad Demo built with the upcoming ExpressBars Suite v6 – the only comprehensive toolbar-menu & docking system for the VCL.

item.title: Developer Express Announces DXperience 2006 vol 3
item.description: November 20, 2006 - Developer Express is proud to announce the immediate availability of DXperience v2006, vol 3.

item.title: ExpressBars v6 Beta is Available to Subscribers
item.description: November 17, 2006 - We are happy to announce the immediate availability of the ExpressBars v6 Beta to our active VCL Subscribers. ExpressBars v6 represents the most significant upgrade to this product library since its initial release over 7 years ago. Among key features introduced in v6 is support for Microsoft's newest toolbar/menu system – the Ribbon.

item.title: The ExpressQuantumGrid Suite v6 is Now Available
item.description: November 17, 2006 - We are happy to announce the immediate availability of the ExpressQuantumGrid Suite v6 – the most comprehensive and feature rich product library of its kind for the VCL.

item.title: Developer Express Announces DXperience 2006 vol 2
item.description: August 24, 2006 - Developer Express is proud to announce the immediate availability of DXperience v2006, vol 2.
